lines.text: I wonder if Cadets wear corsets to get that military shape.
So you aspire to a career in the Army?
Oh, no! I'm just going to study a little war... in case I ever get married.
You're a peach, Betty! I'm awfully glad you met me!
You've been trying to give papa the go-by... haven't you?
If ever a player means more than the Corps' honor... we'll abolish football!
